title: G20 finance chiefs say inflation, geopolitical risks threaten recovery -draft communique - Reuters
content: G20 finance chiefs say inflation, geopolitical risks threaten recovery -draft communique  Reuters
description: Finance leaders from the Group of 20 major economies view inflation and geopolitical risks as threats to a global recoveryfrom the COVID-19 pandemic that already is "asynchronous" due to uneven access to vaccines, a draft communique obtained by Reuters showed on Thursday.
